
require 'vendor/autoload.php';

use Aws\Ses\SesClient; 
use Aws\Exception\AwsException;

//Create a SESClient 
$SesClient = new Aws\Ses\SesClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2010-12-01',
    'region' => 'us-east-2'
]);

$domain = 'domain.name';

try {
    $result = $SesClient->verifyDomainIdentity([
        'Domain' => $domain,
    ]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}
